name: Sâ€™Mores Cheesecake Square
ingredients: 6 bars (1.55 oz) milk chocolate candy, coarsely chopped, divided
instructions: Place 14 of the crackers in food processor; cover.
Press onto bottom of 9 x 13 pan.
Coarsely chop remaining 4 graham crackers; set aside.
Mix cream cheese, remaining 1 c. sugar and vanilla with mixer until well blended.
Stir in 1/2 of the chopped candy.
Sprinkle with remaining candy, marshmallows and reserved chopped graham crackers.
Bake at 350 for 40 minutes or until center is almost set.
